title: Maruti Suzuki to launch EV with a holistic ecosystem to address range anxiety and resale value
description: Maruti Suzuki is set to launch its first electric vehicle, a mid-size SUV eVX, with a range of over 500 kms. The company aims to address concerns about range anxiety, charging infrastructure, and resale value. Additionally, Maruti Suzuki plans to introduce strong hybrids, hydrogen, and bio-fuel models to reduce carbon emissions.
